artist: Painter: After Anthony van Dyck; Engraver: Thomas A. E. Chambars
catalogue_raissonne:
Hollstein 26 (Van Voerst copy)
New Hollstein ( Dutch & Flemish) 97 (Van Dyck copy undescribed)
description: 1/2 length portrait turned slight right and looking right; wearing cloak,buttoned doublet and flat white collar; roll of paper in PR hand; cloudy sky behind; after van Voerst engraving; copy in reverse of painting by van Dyck
inscription:
Signature, Title, and  Inscription.
 
URC in black: Vol. 4. P. 34. / below image in black: V. Dyck pinx   T. Chambars sculp / ROBERT VAN VOERST | on sheet in pencil: 2-570
portfolio: From Walpole's Anecdotes of Painting, London 1767-1771
title: Robert van Voerst
